#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main(){
	int T;
	cin >> T;
	string s;
	int freq[26];
	int asciia  = (int)'a';
	while(T--){
		cin >> s;
		for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
			freq[i] = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)
			freq[s[i]-asciia]++;
		int max=0;
		int maxc;
		for(int i=25; i>=0;i--){
			if(freq[i] >= max){
				max = freq[i];
				maxc = i;
			}
		}
		for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){
			if((int)s[i] == maxc+asciia)
				s[i] = '?';
		}
		cout << s << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
